rows.head: Personal Intrusion Detection and Prevention - PID/P

body.title: Detailed description PID/P
body.meta: German | Work in Progress (Estimated completion – end of October 2017) | Current Volume 120 pages – Planed Volume about 130 page
body.description: Detailed description of the technology to reduce thespread of critical content including misinformation, propaganda, racist or xenophobic content throughout social media nor requiring any technical support of the operator (Personal Intrusion Detection and Prevention (PID/P)
body.structure: Detailed analysis of the problem and a suitable problem-solving approach. The document provides • A detailed description of the base operations implemented in the editorial components. • Comparison to other projects. • Full-stack description of work-packages #1-8. • Dissemination strategy, etc.
